import React, {useState} from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import './signcard.css'; import Validate from './ValidateInfo'; const Signup = () => { const [name, setName] = useState('') const [date, setDate] = useState('') const [month, setMonth] = useState('') const [year, setYear] = useState('') const [gender, setGender] = useState('') const [phone, setPhone] = useState('') const [pin, setPin] = useState('') const [email, setEmail] = useState('') const [aadhar, setAadhar] = useState('') const submitForm = e => { alert("Current state is : " + JSON.stringify({name, date, month, year, gender, phone, pin, email, aadhar})) console.log("Current state is : " + JSON.stringify({name, date, month, year, phone, pin, email, aadhar})) const values = { name: name, date : date, month: month, year: year, gender: gender, phone: phone, pin: pin, email: email, aadhar: aadhar, } const errors = Validate(values) console.log("Errors : " + errors.name) //e.preventDefualt() } const valName = (e) => { setName(e.target.value) console.log(e.target.value.match(/^[a-zA-Z]$/)) if(!e.target.value.match(/[a-zA-Z]/)) { console.log("Error name!") } } var dates = []; for (let i = 1; i <= 31; i++) { dates.push(i) } const dateList = dates.map((x) => {return()}); var years = []; for (let i = 1930; i <= 2020; i++) { years.push(i) } const yearList = years.map((x) => {return()}); return( <>

); } export default Signup;
